name: Crowned
description:
Game Made for the One Minute Jam

One minute to the sunset... everything will be decided then. The rivalry between the biggest clans in the wild west are about to come to an end with a big boom. Encarnate one of them liders in this duel of epic proportions.

How To Play

The duel is about to start, just wait until the last bit of sun is hidden and shoot before your opponent. But be careful, if you try to shoot ahead of time your gun will get stuck and you will lose precious time.

Game Modes
  • 1P:  Solo play. Take control of the Player 1 against the AI.
  • VS:  Versus mode. Play against a friend on local multiplayer.
Controlls
  • Player 1 (the one on the left side):  SPACE or LEFT CLICK to shoot.
  • Player 2 (the one on the right side): ENTER or RIGHT CLICK to shoot.

F4: Enable/Disable full screen (Windows only).

Credits

Sounds and Music from freesound.org

  • Duel music by: Flower Mantis
  • Menu music by: shalpin
  • Tumbleweed sounds by: duckduckpony
  • Trigger pull effect by: bennychico11
  • Body  falling effect by: leonelmail

Graphics, Code and Design by: @AppsFrisk
